name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;Selena;Good job on clearing out those bandits, Erina.|If I didn't have to leave so soon, I would've made short work of them.
speak;Eirika;Thank you...|I don't want to see anymore innocent lives lost.
speak;Selena;I will take my leave now.|I hope I'm wrong, and I never see you again.
speak;Selena;Good job on clearing out those bandits...|Wait a moment. Who are you?|You aren't from one of the neighboring towns, are you?|And your weapons give you away...|You're no peasant.
speak;Eirika;I am Er...|My name is Erina.{br}I'm a mercenary.
speak;Selena;A mercenary named Erina, is it?|There's more to you than that, I feel.|But don't worry--it's none of my business.|I haven't told you who I am yet, have I?
speak;Selena;I am Selena, a general in Grado's army.
speak;Selena;Right. Well...|Again, good job.|The destruction would have been far worse without you.
speak;Eirika;Thank you...|I don't want to see anymore innocent lives lost.
speak;Selena;I will take my leave now.|I hope I'm wrong, and I never see you again.
